com.bestmealmate.premium_monthly.title: BestMealMate Premium
com.bestmealmate.premium_monthly.description: AI-powered meal planning, unlimited recipes, pantry tracking, and smart grocery lists. Auto-renews monthly.

com.bestmealmate.family_monthly.title: BestMealMate Family
com.bestmealmate.family_monthly.description: Everything in Premium plus up to 6 family members, shared meal plans, and dietary preferences for each member. Auto-renews monthly.
